```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r data, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
strength <- read_csv("strength.csv")
View(strength)
```

## Summary
The strength data set was compiled from the [KNHANES](https://knhanes.cdc.go.kr/knhanes/main.do) and the [NHANES](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nchs/nhanes/) surveys

```{r strength summary}
summary(strength)
```

## PLOTS
```{r first plot, echo=FALSE, out.width='50%', fig.align='center', fig.cap="Fig. 1: Maximum grip strenght as a function on body mass in men and women"}

ggplot(strength, aes(wt, gs.max, col=sex, shape=survey))+
  geom_point()+
  xlab("Body Mass (kg)")+
  ylab("Grip Strength (kg)")
```
